class.name: minestar.production.domain.underground.area.UndergroundAreaTimeLineRecord
class.meta: A historical record of when the status of an underground Area changed.

many-to-one.name: area
many-to-one.meta: A reference to the underground Area (MSMODEL.UNDERGROUND_AREA) that this record applies to.

property.name: statusText
property.meta: The textual description of the status that the underground Area changed to.

property.name: statusOID
property.meta: The OID of the status that the underground Area changed to.

property.name: closed
property.meta: Whether the new status represents a closed underground Area. (This flag is '1' if it represents a closed underground Area and '0' if it does not.)

property.name: oldStatusText
property.meta: The textual description of the status that the underground Area changed from.

property.name: oldStatusOID
property.meta: The OID of the status that the underground Area changed from.

property.name: oldClosed
property.meta: Whether the previous status represents a closed underground Area. (This flag is '1' if it represents a closed underground Area and '0' if it does not.)

property.name: changeDate
property.meta: The timestamp of when the underground Area's status change occurred.
The UTC timestamp of when the underground Area's status change occurred.
